TEXT.TITLE: DYNAMICS RESEARCH <DRCO> GETS NAVY CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Dynamics Research Corp said it has received a two-year 9,995,000 dlr U.S. Navy contract to supply a number of accelerometer test stations and spares for Trident submarine guidance systems. Reuter
